messages.subject: Re:Fears
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/13/2001 3:03:47 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/13/2001 3:03:47 PM Eastern Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> The fear throughout childhood of shock, infertility and colon cancer could
> ruin an othewise joyous childhood
>
> Excellent points Sandra. . . and for me, since every thing we see around
> us. . .every single thing begins with a thought, my belief is that all
> dis-ease begins with a thought. . . not to say there are other things
> contributing, but if certainly begins there. I think the thought process we
> put into what we eat, when we prepare it, eat it, digest it, etc. has the
> most effect on how our body uses it. Controlling thoughts all the time cant
> be good for the digestive system. . . its a good reminder for me today.
>
>




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
